questions.text: A 25-year-old woman presents with a history of easy bruising, prolonged bleeding after dental procedures, and heavy menstrual bleeding. options.label: B
options.text: Type 2 vWD is due to qualitative defects in vWF

options.label: C
options.text: Type 3 vWD is associated with normal levels of vWF but defective function

questions.correct_answer: C. Type 3 vWD is associated with normal levels of vWF but defective function
